description: Morecambe sign Barnsley forward Andy Dallas on loan for the remainder of the season.
title: Andy Dallas: Morecambe sign Barnsley forward on loan
title_page: Andy Dallas: Morecambe sign Barnsley forward on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Morecambe have signed Barnsley forward Andy Dallas on loan for the rest of the season.
The 25-year-old scored five goals in 23 appearances for Barrow during a loan spell in the first half of the season.
He made a goalscoring debut in a 7-0 win for Barnsley over Port Vale after joining them in the summer of 2023 but has yet to establish himself at Oakwell.
"I'll try and get in behind and obviously score goals, that comes with games, but what I can promise is work rate and I'll give everything for the shirt," Dallas told the Shrimps' website.
Morecambe are at home to Lancashire rivals Fleetwood Town on Saturday.
